Translations.Text: Nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgi xudro ʙa poki jod kun, cunon ki loiqi ʙuzurgii Ust
on Zote, ki ofarid maxluqotro va ustuvor dost
Va on Zote, ki andoza mu'ajjan kard. Sipas hama xalqro ʙa on ci munosiʙ mesavand, roh namud
Va on Zote, ki carogohhoro rujonid
sipas xusku sijoh gardonid
Mo Qur'onro ʙaroi tu ej Rasul xohem xond va tu digar onro faromus naxohi kard
ƣajri on ci Alloh ʙixohad, hamono U oskoru pinhonro medonad
Va dar kori tu va dar hamai umuri dini va dunjavie, ki ʙa tu ru menamojad, osoni padid meovarem
Ej Rasul, agar ʙa qavmat pand dodanat foida kunad, pand deh. Xudro azoʙ madeh dar pand dodani saxse, ki sarkasi mekunad
Har kase, ki az Alloh metarsad, ʙa zudi pand xohad paziruft
Va ʙadʙaxttarin fard az on pand duri xohad guzid
Hamon kas, ki dar otasi ʙuzurgi cahannam daraftad
Ongoh dar on co na ʙimirad, ki rohat joʙad va na zinda mesavad, ki foida ʙinad
Ba durusti, kase ki xudro pokiza dost, nacot joft
Va rastagor sud, har ki nomi Parvardigori xudro ʙar zaʙon ovard va ʙaroi rizogii U namoz guzorid
Balki, sumo ej mardum, zindagii in cahonro az ne'mathoi oxirat afzal mesumored
Hol on ki oxirat ʙehtaru pojandatar ast
Begumon, in suxanho dar kitoʙhoi pesina niz hast
kitoʙhoi Iʙrohim va Muso alajhimassalom
Ej Rasul, ojo xaʙari qijomat, ki ʙo saxtihojas odamonro faro megirad ʙa tu rasidaast
Cehrahoi kofiron dar on ruz ʙa azoʙ xor xohand ʙud
taloskardavu rancdida
otasi suzon ʙa on merasad
az casmai ʙisjor garm nusonda mesavand
onon xurokero cuz xori talx nadorand
ki na farʙeh mekunad va na gurusnagiro az ʙajn meʙarad
Cehrahoi mu'minon dar on ruz xurram va toza xohand ʙud
Va az kusisi xud va amale, ki dar dunjo kardaand, dar oxirat rozi xohand ʙud
dar ʙihiste olimaqom
ki dar on co hec suxani ʙehuda nasunavi
va dar on casmasorho ravon ʙosand
va dar on co taxthoi ʙaland va oli ast
va kuzahoe nihoda ʙaroi nusandagon
va ʙolisthoe dar kanori ham cida
va farshoi nafisi pahnkarda
Ojo kofiron ʙa sutur namenigarand, ki ci guna ofarida sudaast
Va ʙa osmon, nigoh namekunand, ki ci guna ʙardosta sudaast
Va ʙa kuhho, namenigarand, ki ci guna ʙarqaror gardidaand
Va ʙa zamin, namenigarand, ki ci guna gusturda sudaast
Pas pand deh ej Rasul, ki tu panddihandae hasti. Va ƣamgin maʙos az on kasone, ki haqro qaʙul nadorand
Tu ʙar onon farmonravo nesti, to ononro ʙa imon ovardan macʙur kuni
Magar, on kas ki ruj gardond az pandu nasihat va kofir sud va ʙar kufras davomat kard
Alloh ʙo ʙuzurgtarin azoʙ uro azoʙ mekunad
Alʙatta ʙozgastason ʙa'di marg ʙa sui Most
Ongoh hisoʙi onon ʙar uhdai Mo ast
Alloh savgand mexurad ʙa vaqti suʙh
va savgand ʙa saʙhoi dahgona, dah saʙi Zulhicca, saʙhoi purfajz
va savgand ʙa cuftu toq, az hama asjo
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ʙigzarad
Ojo xiradmandonro in savgandho ʙasanda nest
Ej Rasul, ojo nadidi, ki Parvardigori tu ʙo qavmi Od ci kard
Qavmi Iram, ki sohiʙi qomathoi ʙaland va sutunmonand ʙudand
Ki monandi on dar quvvat va ʙuzurgii casad dar hec sahre ofarida nasudaast
Va ci guna kard ʙo qavmi Samud, ki dar on vodi taxtasanghoi ʙuzurgro tarosida va az on ʙaroi xud xonaho girifta ʙudand
Va ci guna kard ʙo Fir'avn, podsohi Misr sohiʙi laskari azim, ki mulkasro ustuvor va amrasro qavi dostand
Hamon kasone, ki dar sahrho az had tacovuz kardand
va dar onho ʙisjor fasod kardand
pas Parvardigori tu tozijonai azoʙro saxt ʙar sarason furud ovard
Ej Rasul, hamono Parvardigorat dar kamingoh ast. Kasone, ki Uro nofarmoni kardand, andake muhlat medihad va ʙa'd az on onhoro ʙa azoʙi saxt giriftor mekunad
Ammo odamiro, cun Parvardigoras ʙijozmojad va giromias dorad va ne'matas dihad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro giromi dost»
Va cun ʙijozmojadas va rizqasro ʙar u tang girad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro xor dostaast»
Na! Cunin nest, ʙalki giromi dostan ʙo to'ati Alloh ast va xori dostan ʙa nofarmonʙardorii Ust, sumo jatimro giromi namedored
va hamdigarro ʙa ta'om dodani miskin tarƣiʙ namekuned
va moli merosro harisona mexured
va molro ʙisjor dust dored
Na! Hargiz cunin nest, ki megued, cun zamin sikasta savad va pora-pora gardad
va Parvardigori tu ʙaroi hisoʙu kitoʙi xalqas ojad va faristagon saf - saf hozir savand
Va dar on ruz cahannamro hozir orand, kofir pand girad va tavʙa kunad. Va ci coi pand giriftan ʙosad
Megujad: «Ej kos, ki ʙaroi hajoti covidonai xud pesopes nekihoe mefiristodam». Va ci coi pusajmoni ast, ki dar dunjo pusajmon nasud va tavʙa nakard
Pas dar on ruzi dusvor kase cun azoʙi U azoʙ nakunad
va hec kas monandi zanciri U ʙa zancir nakasad
Gufta savad: Ej ruhi oromisjofta, ʙa zikri Alloh
xusnudu pisandida ʙa sui Parvardigorat ʙozgard
va dar zumrai ʙandagoni solehi Man doxil sav
va ʙa hamrohason ʙa ʙihisti Man daroj
